name: Mandatory revocation of license by a court
text: Any court of competent jurisdiction shall forthwith revoke the license of any driver upon a conviction of the driver of manslaughter resulting from the operation of a motor vehicle. [L 1937, c 234, §22; RL 1945, §7323; RL 1955, §160-55; am L 1965, c 122, §1; HRS ; am L 1970, c 164, §3; am L 1971, c 171, §1]
